item.title: Ruth B - Lost Boy
item.description: This video is for educational purposes only.

item.title: Ruth B - Lost Boy - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: Em, G, C, Am, D
As performed by Ruth B.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/ewuvUPrfSks
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Ruth B - Lost Boy - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: Em, G, C, Am, D
As performed by Ruth B.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/ewuvUPrfSks
This is an updated version of the song to show the single notes (where played in the song) and the actual arpeggiated D chord.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Ruth B - Lost Boy
item.description:
For educational use. Created with letter names so any non-transposing instrument can play along. Key of G.
Chords Used: Em, G, C, Am, D
As performed by Ruth B.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/ewuvUPrfSks
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Ruth B - Lost Boy - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. (Original Key).
There is a new version of this play along available, with more detail (single notes included, exact arpeggiated D chord). Visit: https://youtu.be/zLRuPZj0lYU
Also available: a tutorial on the sister site of this channel: https://youtu.be/ewuvUPrfSks
This works very well with ukulele. If you ever want to play the single low notes that occur before a verse or chorus, just hit the 3rd string.
As performed by Ruth B.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Ruth B - Lost Boy - Key of G
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
All rights belong to Ruth B.
CHORDS USED: Em, G, C, D
